history.content:
We can make the final exam open from Thursday afternoon 12/7.  

Send me a reminder closer to.  It looks like the first final exam is at 2:50pm

on Thursday Dec. 7, so we'll make it available from then through the

weekend:

  http://www.registrar.gatech.edu/students/exams.php

--Eric

Hello Professor,

I know it is too early but just wanted to confirm the exact day and time when the final exam window would open for students based in US.

Accordingly to official schedule, it will be on Dec 8th, Friday but on the thread @14, you have mentioned that it would open around noon on Dec 7th, Thu.

So does that mean that students who are based in US would also be able to give the exam starting noon on Dec 7th, Thu?

I will be flying out of US on Dec 8th, Fri so wanted to confirm the dates again before booking the international flight tickets.

Many thanks in advance.
history.subject: When will the final exam window open for US students
